contentrichtext.text: *Delete. Vanity. Google returns 34 hits for "No Conscription leagues" -- [[User:Chris 73|Chris 73]] | ([http://www.wikipedia.org/w/wiki.phtml?title=User_talk:Chris_73&action=edit&section=new New]) [[User talk:Chris 73|Talk]] 03:00, 30 Apr 2004 (UTC) *I disagree that this page is vanity. It is insufficient as is, but could be better. If anything, it just needs to be reworked, and taken beyond 1 or 2 sentences. Thinking of Canadian context, it could include some of the protests following mandatory conscription in Quebec. **Unsigned objection don't get counted. I agree with Alcarillo below, redirect. [[User:RickK|Rick]]'''[[User talk:RickK|K''']] 22:11, 30 Apr 2004 (UTC) * Redirect to [[conscientious objector]], seeing how there's insufficient info here. [[User:Alcarillo|Alcarillo]] 07:15, 30 Apr 2004 (UTC) *<s>Definitely not vanity. I believe the title should be "No Conscription League", which gets 130 google hits, or possibly "No Conscription", for which google hits are probably meaningless. Also note this is linked from [[Emma Goldman]]. I'd would say merge with [[Emma Goldman]] and redirect unless expanded, but the fact that "leagues" isn't capitalised makes me think maybe there is a generic term as well. But a redirect to [[conscientious objector]] would be confusing. So delete unless expanded.</s> Expanded. No vote. [[User:Anthony DiPierro|anthony]] [[User:Anthony_DiPierro/warning|(see warning)]] 01:45, 1 May 2004 (UTC) *<s>First, not vanity. Second, protests against conscription are covered in [[Conscription Crisis]]. Redirect there. [[User:Andris|Andris]] 22:31, May 1, 2004 (UTC)</s> *I rewrote it, with more details. Let's keep the new version. [[User:Andris|Andris]] 22:47, May 1, 2004 (UTC)
